content: {"name": "Inspiration Ministries - Polk - Food Distribution Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "All patrons must sign in at the parking lot at 4730 Lakeland Highlands Rd., Lakeland, FL (across from the Highland Park Church) before going to the pantry location.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.blessingsandhope.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2150 East Edgewood Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Lakeland", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "33803", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 28.0138541, "longitude": -81.9175515}, "phones": [{"number": "(863) 698-7512", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}]}
